author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chennai District Election Office on Monday conducted training sessions on poll preparations for the 16 Assembly constituencies of the district.

According to a press release, officials received training on the model code of conduct. The sessions covered how to scrupulously avoid all activities which are corrupt and that are offences under the election law.

Chennai District Election Officer B. Chandra Mohan and Additional District Election Officer T.G. Vinay participated, the release said.
title: Training sessions on poll conduct
